Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Interface MetricsTableWrapperAggregate

All Known Implementing Classes:
MetricsTableWrapperAggregateImpl
@Private public interface MetricsTableWrapperAggregate
Interface of class that will wrap a MetricsTableSource and export numbers so they can be used in MetricsTableSource
